message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV 

This paper proposes a lightweight recurrent network for sequence modeling, which is a common task in natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision (CV). Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also focuses on improving computational efficiency, which is a common concern in machine learning, leading to the possibility of it being categorized under cs.LG (Machine Learning) or cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, the paper proposes a new approach to handling long-range dependencies, which is a common challenge in recurrent networks, making it relevant to cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Finally, the paper evaluates its proposed method on NLP tasks, which further supports the likelihood of it being categorized under cs.CL.
